pr_title: Yf make BaseUtils methods more robust to handle all possible byte values

timeline.message: - test to show that BaseUtils.convertIUPACtoN fails for the "top half" of bytes, as they are interpreted as negatives.
- fixed access to baseIndexMap and baseIndexWithIupacMap so that it converts the input byte to unsigned first.

timeline.bodyText: Can you also add a call to BaseUtils.simpleBaseToBaseIndex() in this test method, to cover the other change you made?
timeline.author: droazen
